main event: Three objects were spotted together in flight from east to west in Akron, Ohio, on August 5-6, 1963.
interesting points: The objects appeared as large lights and made a right turn to the west., The observation duration was less than 1 minute., The objects were very fast and faded into the distance., At 2:25 a.m., one object was seen flying from north to west., The report suggests the objects were similar in appearance to Jupiter in flight.
sighted object: three large lights in the sky
